text: Proentelodon is an extinct genus of entelodont artiodactyl from the Middle Eocene of Mongolia. P. minutus is the oldest representative of the family Entelodontidae, P. minutus gen. et sp. nov, is described from the Middle Eocene Khaichin Ula II Fauna in Mongolia. ==References== Category:Entelodonts Category:Eocene even-toed ungulates Category:Fossils of Mongolia Category:Fossil taxa described in 2008
title: Proentelodon
